summary:
Welcome! 

Thanks for viewing my profile. My past years of education took place in institutions in six different countries and were combined with various jobs in different departments. Currently employed as a project-based PhD candidate (until 09/2024), which combines academic research with consulting work for all supermarket chains in the Netherlands.

Education: The Double Degree Master of Marketing at the highly ranked University of Groningen and BI Norwegian Business School has provided me with practical marketing tools, advanced statistical modeling techniques, and research capabilities.

Work: To apply those theories and gain practical experience, I have additionally worked in multiple marketing and communication positions and engaged in research-based consulting projects with well-known firms. Please find more information on this in the listings below.

Hobbies: Outside of work you can find me on a beach volleyball field or tennis court, listening to or making music, working on creative projects, or just hanging out with friends.

Please feel free to contact me for exciting ideas, research projects or to just have a chat :)

projects: [{'title': 'Research-based Consulting Projects: Consultant and Researcher', 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'description': 'Various consulting projects for firms using existing industry and scientific knowledge, literature reviews, competitor analyses and, most importantly, generating new data-based insights. Firms range from small start-ups that need general strategic consulting to large cooperations and industry leaders requesting support in big data management. ', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'David', 'last_name': 'Olk', 'name': None, 'headline': 'PhD Candidate Marketing & Data Analytics'}]}, {'title': 'MARUG Sustainable Marketing Event: Podcast and Event Host', 'date': {'start': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'description': 'Hosting the MARUG Sustainable Marketing Event during Corona meant being flexible: For the first edition, we transformed the event into a five-episode podcast with an introductory monologue and firm interviews. For the second edition, we had to move the event online which meant that I created a streaming set-up in my home office to host via Zoom. All in all, successful events.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'David', 'last_name': 'Olk', 'name': None, 'headline': 'PhD Candidate Marketing & Data Analytics'}]}, {'title': 'DJ Mag Germany: Journalist, Reporter, and Photographer', 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'description': 'The DJ Mag is the market leader in news coverage around artists, festivals, and releases for Electronic Dance Music (EDM).
